title: Why am I not able to complete the course in my studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Consistency is very important” You are not able to complete your course because you are not consistent to your studies, may be you are procrastinating … You should be regular and attracted towards your studies for doing it in a enjoying manner. If you study regularly then don't make goal for studying for an hour or 2, your goal should be like complete a whole topic or chapter every day doesn't matter even if it takes more than an hours take breaks intermittently. Maybe it helps you somehow. :-)
